title: Reflecting on Uncertainty in Design Education: Narrative-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Design Process Knowledge and Practical Experience in Scientific Fields
context.additional_context: Strengthening reflective approaches to uncertainty encountered when applying design thinking in science-related professions

learning_goals: Learners can describe three or more cases of uncertainty encountered during the design process and analyze their personal attitudes toward them
Learners can operationalize strategies for accepting uncertainty through narrative reflection and apply them to real projects
Learners can explain two or more changes in their design identity based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
